docs.title: 1. What are the two types of forms in Angular?
docs.text:
Answer: - Template-driven forms: Use Angular directives in HTML. - Reactive forms: Use FormControl and FormGroup in TypeScript.

Reactive Form Sample:

this.loginForm = this.fb.group({
  username: ['', Validators.required],
  password: ['', Validators.required]
});

docs.title: 1. What is useState?
docs.text:
Answer: useState is a React Hook that lets you add state to functional components.

Sample Code:

const [count, setCount] = useState(0);
<button onClick={() => setCount(count + 1)}>Click</button>
